public class TestContainer extends org.testcontainers.containers.PostgreSQLContainer<TestContainer>
The TestContainer class to get a container for our tests.

    • start

      public void start()
      Start container. Overrides the default start method to allow for the container to be started with the correct database name and sets the application.yaml file to use this container's database.
      Specified by:
      start in interface org.testcontainers.lifecycle.Startable
